name: No One Dies Today!!
description:
No One Dies Now!!

Helping one dude to run and jump over objects is one thing. Have you got what it takes to control 5 stickmen on the same day? No One Dies Today is a test your hand-eye coordination game. Find out who can run fastest without tripping!

Outstanding Features: (For real?)
4 Awesome Game Modes
Multiplayer
Everyplay
Crazy Challenges
Simple Controls
Easy & Fun
